author_ssm: Margaret L. Donabedian, December, 2009.  Revised to reflect additions, June, 2011 and June 2014.
unittitle_ssm: Marilynn Gelfman Karp Collection of Ephemera
abstract_ssm: Ephemera materials spanning the late 19th to mid 20th centuries, including trade cards, blotters, cigarette silks, product and dry good labels, greeting cards, postcards, and hairnet packages, among others.
collection_ssm: Marilynn Gelfman Karp Collection of Ephemera
heading_ssm: Marilynn Gelfman Karp Collection of Ephemera
